atlantic.title: The Supreme Cult of Personality
atlantic.topComment: As long as she's not inebriated when on the bench or writing opinions, I don't really care. I'd probably prefer to have a buzz going if I had to sit through the SOTU without working, too.

atlantic.title: Fifty Shades of Dull
atlantic.topComment: "His native brogue is evident in the very first scene, and try as he might to choke it down, it keeps coming back up, like an elocutionary hairball." Slow clap.
